15 ImageProcessor::ImageProcessor() : it_(nh_)
16 {
17  PKG_DIR = ros::package::getPath("ucl_basic_drone");
18  // Subscribe to input video feed and publish output video feed
19  video_channel_ = nh_.resolveName("ardrone/image_raw");
20  image_sub_ = it_.subscribe(video_channel_, 10, &ImageProcessor::imageCb, this); // second param: queue size
21  // image_pub_ = it_.advertise("/image_converter/output_video", 1);
22 
23  // Subscribe to input navdata
24  // navdata_channel = nh_.resolveName("ardrone/navdata");
25  // navdata_sub_ = nh_.subscribe(navdata_channel, 10, &ImageProcessor::navdataCb, this);
26 
27  ImageProcessor::loadTarget();
28 
29  cv::namedWindow(OPENCV_WINDOW1);
30  cv::namedWindow(OPENCV_WINDOW2);
31 }
32 
33 ImageProcessor::~ImageProcessor()
34 {
35  cv::destroyWindow(OPENCV_WINDOW1);
36  cv::destroyWindow(OPENCV_WINDOW2);
37 }

40 void ImageProcessor::imageCb(const sensor_msgs::Image::ConstPtr& msg)
41 {
42  // FIXME: il faut trouver une autre façon de gérer ce callback ...
43  // sinon ça va être du spaghetti
44  // IDEA: threads ?
45 
46  // TODO: add here a way to filter image based on timestamp and/or position
47  // from SDK 2015:
48  // if (navdata.curr_time > 1.5 && navdata.curr_time - Old_time > 0.2)
49  // other idea:
50  // based on prediction of the movement, decide to process or not the image
51  // for some threshold on the displacement
52 
53  ros::Duration delta1 = msg->header.stamp - prev1_stamp_;
54  if (delta1 < ros::Duration(0.1))
55  {
56  return;
57  }
58  prev1_stamp_ = msg->header.stamp;
59 
60  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr;
61  try
62  {
63  cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg, sensor_msgs::image_encodings::BGR8);
64  }
65  catch (cv_bridge::Exception& e)
66  {
67  ROS_ERROR("ucl_drone::imgproc::cv_bridge exception: %s", e.what());
68  return;
69  }
70 
71  // tuto: http://docs.opencv.org/2.4/doc/tutorials/features2d/feature_homography/feature_homography.html
72 
73  // step 1: Detect keypoints in the new image
74  std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> keypoints;
75  detector.detect(cv_ptr->image, keypoints);
76 
77  // Show all keypoints in image
78  cv::Mat output;
79  cv::drawKeypoints(cv_ptr->image, keypoints, output);
80 
81  // Update GUI Window
82  cv::imshow(OPENCV_WINDOW1, output); // cv_ptr->image);
83  cv::waitKey(3);
84 
85  ros::Duration delta2 = msg->header.stamp - prev2_stamp_;
86  if (delta2 < ros::Duration(1))
87  {
88  return;
89  }
90  prev2_stamp_ = msg->header.stamp;
91 
92  if (target_loaded)
93  detectTarget(cv_ptr->image, keypoints);
94 
95  // Output modified video stream
96  // image_pub_.publish(cv_ptr->toImageMsg());
97 }
98 
99 void ImageProcessor::loadTarget()
100 {
101  std::string str = PKG_DIR + TARGET_RELPATH;
102  ROS_INFO("%s", str.c_str());
103  target_img = cv::imread(str.c_str(), CV_LOAD_IMAGE_COLOR); // Read the file
104 
105  if (!target_img.data) // Check for invalid input
106  {
107  ROS_INFO("Could not open or find the image");
108  target_loaded = false;
109  return;
110  }
111 
112  detector.detect(target_img, target_keypoints);
113 
114  extractor.compute(target_img, target_keypoints, target_descriptors);
115 
116  // Get the corners from the target
117  obj_corners.resize(4);
118  obj_corners[0] = cv::Point(0, 0);
119  obj_corners[1] = cv::Point(target_img.cols, 0);
120  obj_corners[2] = cv::Point(target_img.cols, target_img.rows);
121  obj_corners[3] = cv::Point(0, target_img.rows);
122 
123  target_loaded = true;
124  return;
125 }
126 
127 bool ImageProcessor::detectTarget(cv::Mat img, std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> keypoints)
128 {
129  // tuto: http://docs.opencv.org/2.4/doc/tutorials/features2d/feature_homography/feature_homography.html
130 
131  // step 2: Calculate descriptors
132  cv::Mat descriptors;
133  extractor.compute(img, keypoints, descriptors);
134 
135  // step 3: matching descriptors
136  std::vector<cv::DMatch> matches;
137  matcher.match(target_descriptors, descriptors, matches);
138 
139  /*
140  // step 4: max/min distances
141  double min = 10000;
142  double max = 0;
143  for (int i = 0; i < target_descriptors.rows; i++)
144  {
145  double dist = matches[i].distance;
146  if (dist < min)
147  min = dist;
148  if (dist > max)
149  max = dist;
150  }
151 
152  ROS_INFO("max %f", max);
153  ROS_INFO("min %f", min);
154  ROS_INFO("3/4 %f", (min + (max - min) * 3 / 4));
155  ROS_INFO("-----------------");
156  */
157 
158  // step 5: Draw only "good" matches
159  // (i.e. whose distance is less than 3*min_dist )
160  std::vector<cv::DMatch> good_matches;
161 
162  int j = 0;
163  for (int i = 0; i < target_descriptors.rows; i++)
164  {
165  if (matches[i].distance < 250.0)
166  // TODO: distance threshold: 250.0 for a given target ... --> parameter?
167  {
168  good_matches.push_back(matches[i]);
169  j++;
170  }
171  }
172  if (j < target_descriptors.rows / 3.0)
173  return false;
174 
175  cv::Mat img_matches;
176  cv::drawMatches(target_img, target_keypoints, img, keypoints, good_matches, img_matches, cv::Scalar::all(-1),
177  cv::Scalar::all(-1), std::vector<char>(), cv::DrawMatchesFlags::NOT_DRAW_SINGLE_POINTS);
178 
179  // step 6: Localize the object
180  std::vector<cv::Point2f> obj;
181  std::vector<cv::Point2f> scene;
182 
183  for (int i = 0; i < good_matches.size(); i++)
184  {
185  // Get the keypoints from the good matches
186  obj.push_back(target_keypoints[good_matches[i].queryIdx].pt);
187  scene.push_back(keypoints[good_matches[i].trainIdx].pt);
188  }
189 
190  cv::Mat H = cv::findHomography(obj, scene, CV_RANSAC);
191 
192  // step 7: Get the corners from the target
193  std::vector<cv::Point2f> scene_corners(4);
194 
195  cv::perspectiveTransform(obj_corners, scene_corners, H);
196 
197  // step 8: Draw lines between the corners (the mapped object in the scene - image_2 )
198  cv::line(img_matches, scene_corners[0] + obj_corners[1], scene_corners[1] + obj_corners[1], cv::Scalar(0, 255, 0), 4);
199  cv::line(img_matches, scene_corners[1] + obj_corners[1], scene_corners[2] + obj_corners[1], cv::Scalar(0, 255, 0), 4);
200  cv::line(img_matches, scene_corners[2] + obj_corners[1], scene_corners[3] + obj_corners[1], cv::Scalar(0, 255, 0), 4);
201  cv::line(img_matches, scene_corners[3] + obj_corners[1], scene_corners[0] + obj_corners[1], cv::Scalar(0, 255, 0), 4);
202 
203  // Show detected matches
204  cv::imshow(OPENCV_WINDOW2, img_matches);
205  return true;
206 }

208 int main(int argc, char** argv)
209 {
210  ros::init(argc, argv, "basic_drone_imgproc");
211  ImageProcessor ic;
212  ros::spin();
213  return 0;
214 }
